description: Lightweight open-source API gateway with HCL configuration for routing, access control, and backend connectivity
rules: Couper configuration uses HCL 2.0 (HashiCorp Configuration Language) syntax
Configuration blocks nest hierarchically: server > api > endpoint > proxy/request > backend
Access controls (basic_auth, jwt, oauth2, oidc, saml) are defined in a definitions block and referenced by label name
Beta features use the beta_ prefix in block names (beta_job, beta_rate_limit, beta_oauth2)
